episodes.title: Reel Answers/Blessed Child/Documentary film about Moonies Cult, now with Korean Subtitles
episodes.description: Meet the director Cara Jones as she discusses with Andrew Herwitz how she was able to make a film about her family who is still in the Unification Church, ie the Moonies Cult.

episodes.title: Blessed Child REEL ANSWERS  with Andrew Herwitz| /Documentary- She Left the CULT that Raised her
episodes.description:
The Film Sales Company President, Andrew Herwitz, talks with Director Cara Jones.

She grew up in a cult-The Unitarian Church A/K/A MOONIES. She was married in a stadium in Seol Korea to a man she had never met because Reverend Moon told her to do so. One day she left the Church. Her parents stayed. Now she has made a movie about her experience. You won't be alive your eyes.

Subscribe for new REEL ANSWERS filmmaker conversations every Wednesday.
Watch the full film and trailer on  @TheFilmSalesCompany

episodes.title: Blessed Child | Full Documentary/ Cults, Religion, Family Drama, Arranged Marriage, Autobiographical
episodes.description:
She grew up in a cult-The Unitarian Church A/K/A MOONIES. She was married in a stadium in Seoul Korea to a man she had never met because Reverend Moon told her to do so. Who Needs Tinder or Hinge if you can have an arranged marriage? One day she left the Church. Her parents stayed. Now she has made a movie about her experience. You won't believe your eyes. BLESSED CHILD is one daughter’s attempt to unpack the legacy of the decisions her parents made while challenging assumptions - hers and ours - about cults and family.

Director: Cara Jones

New Directors New Films

Subscribe to  @TheFilmSalesCompany  for more a new specially curated film every Monday
